text: Lee Jung-eun (; born January 23, 1970) is a South Korean actress. She is best known internationally for her role as the housekeeper Moon-gwang in the Academy Award winning film Parasite. == Filmography == === Film === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !
